title: The Gray Nemesis
description: The steely-eyed machine of vengeance who fought for justice after the dread loss of his wife and daughter to a vicious crime ring... Richard Henry Benson...The Avenger! A complete history and retrospective of the man, his adventures, his aides, gadgets and multimedia appearances. Step into the roaring heart of the crucible with the most authoritative account of The Avenger's amazing career available.
author: Howard Hopkins
